original_text: I will send either Artemas or Tychicus to you. After one of them has arrived, please come to meet me in Nicopolis. Come as quickly as you can. I have decided that I will stay in Nicopolis during the winter.
korean_text: 내가 아데마나 두기고를 네게 보내리니 그 때에 네가 급히 니고볼리로 내게 오라 내가 거기서 겨울을 지내기로 작정하였노라

sentences.original_text: I will send either Artemas or Tychicus to you.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 아르테마나 티기코를 너에게 보낼 것이다.

sentences.original_text: After one of them has arrived,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들 중 한 명이 도착한 후에,

sentences.original_text: please come to meet me in Nicopolis.
Come as quickly as you can.
sentences.korean_translation: 할 수 있는 한 빨리 오시오.

sentences.original_text: that I will stay in Nicopolis during the winter.
